# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and excellence. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or needs. For a limited time, I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special price of $125. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the unparalleled quality we stand for. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
